title: Thunderbird
content: Thunderbird has started opening a "Reply to sender with a copy to myself" e-mail when I double click to open an e-mail. If I actually send a reply, the original e-mail disappears from my Inbox. How do I stop this? Thanks.
creator: dossan30

title: Delete messages
content: Whole thing running very slowly. Keeps trying to compact folders, Inbox I think,. Have about 88 000 messages in Inbox. Could just delete older ones, say older than a year. Any simple way of doing that?
creator: jboyd6

title: Links open in tasks
content:
Hello! I am using thunderbird to collect my tasks directly from emails, and it is a great product. When I update it to a new version (v138.0.2), unfortunately, I can not open the links (like mid:*****) created in the tasks. This problem did not occur previously.

Regards!
creator: risingsunli

title: Recipient not receiving my sent e-mails, but, receiving e-mails from recipient using Thunderbird.
content: Recipient does receive my sent e-mails using spectrum webmail. Spectrum webmail can send and receive e-mails. Thunderbird can receive, but, cannot send. Sending and receiving to following domain @hawaii.gov. Any ideas why this is so? Thank you for your attention to this matter.
creator: howard.ishizuka

title: Messages appear but will not open
content:
Hello!

I use Thunderbird to access the old ALT newsgroups for Star Trek content. All of a sudden, messages appear in the top window, but when I select one the content will not appear in the reading pane. Likewise, if I double-click on the message same thing, another window pops up but it is blank.

So far I have uninstalled and reinstalled TB twice. Ran a full Norton system scan

Please advise. Thanks! MB
creator: octomjbber

title: Abusix Mail Intelligence has blocked me sending emails on Thunderbird
content:
Hello,

Please could you help me as I can't send emails. The error message I receive is as below.

I have logged into Telstra mail and can send messages from there so the problem is with Thunderbird according to the Telstra technician.

Thanks so much.
creator: CC
